In this game, you can either be Spongebob, Patrick, Mr.Crabs or Sandy. The alternative is you can be the fisherman with all the hooks and bait required. 

As a normal character, let's take Spongebob, your goal is to be the biggest scarity sponge you can be trying to avoid those fishermen hooks, or maybe attempt to get your stupid friends off  the hooks. Lookin' at you Mr.Patrick Hooks in mouth. 

As Patrick you can bum rush that stupid killer and take all the hooks away from him with your handy dandy tool box, and damn near always die trying.

As Sandy you can run for days and days and days with your squirrel like sprint reflexes.

As Mr.Crabs you can heal your teammates all guchi like for all that money.

Then FINALLY as the killer. You can bait them fish, put tiny bell trinky-dinks, or just straight ninja hook that fish in his butt.

I'm Hooked/10 Would recommend.

this game is bloody awful... you pay 20$ for a game that looks and plays as if it was made in a month... its very glitchy/buggy...I have jumped through a window and than taken 3 steps and than the killer hits me from the opposite side of the window..(what??) Yet when i am the killer i swing at people and hit them and than nothing happens and they will quickly drop a piece of wood infront of me and its like my swing never even landed??
A guy was bloodied and i hit him right before he was at the exit and what do you know once again seems to do nothing... and right after he takes 2 steps and escapes after i hit him with a killing blow that didn't even register once again.. Game should be $5 at most.. gives a few hours of entertainment at most..  Would not recommend, way too glitchy... 2/10.

Bug-ridden. 
No ability to customize key bindings which is stupid. 
Falling through the map and endlessly falling with no reset to position. 
Not even going to bother writing something funny or witty because this is just stupid for a full release.

(I reccommend this game with the hope that they will fix the small amount of flaws it has. Once those have been fixed/added then this game will be perfect) Just writing this review to let people know before they buy. Currently (6/18/2016) there is no play with friends option. A lot of people sit there writing their bogus comments saying "THATS NOT NECESSARY TO PLAY THE GAME YOU DONT HAVE TO PLAY WITH FRIENDS BLAH BLAH BLAH" 9/10 of the games I buy, I buy to play with my friends, and the fact that it doesn't even say you can't play with your friends (unless you have a full games worth, 4 survivors and 1 killer) is extremely misleading since it says co-op. There are definetly some flaws with this game besides that though. Trying to play as killer can prove to be very frustrating as the matchmaking in this game is practically non-existient. 1. You'll be put into max leveled players, which when they have all their perk slots activated and filled that can get extremely annoying. 2. You'll sit there in the lobby for at least 5 minutes waiting for even 1 person to join, and when the game starts loading you very well can end up getting kicked back out to the create a lobby screen.  I think this game has a lot of potential, I just would need a few things to be fixed and added before I could actually sit down and fully enjoy it.
If you like penis youll like this game!

I take back my statement of this being a decent game. I thought this would be somewhat fun, though it is complete shit. Movement is idiotic, laggy, and overall dreadful. Servers dont know what "working properly" is as well as it takes more than 10 times to even get in a lobby. Then, you wait for at least 5-10 minutes for everyone else to even press the fucking ready button. 

On multiple occasions I would be running away from the killer, throw a barracade down to STUN HIM then get hit the next moment because if the killer isn't directly infrount of it, he is not stunned. Shit game, shit servers, hope it gets better, but I doubt it.
i dont if it is just my computer but so much lag so can you please fix it and thank you

I very much am addicted to this game. It's been a while since I played any kind of video game of any kind, seen the beta on twitch and thought that looks fun so I prepaid and got the beta. I played for 2 days and then got the release and can't stop playing it. Yea there a few problems with it but that's to be expected since it's new. Not like the public lobby the ready button needs to be removed or something people take forever to click it always waiting minutes for then to do so. But other than that I love it and glad that I get to play it.  Good job guys....

Failed to join the game

ok i got the game as far as the main menu. Crazy Right? What I did to get it was to go into the properties of the game and change the settings to run as administrator. Once i saved the settings I closed all my other apps and ran steam as administrator. I don't know if this is the legit way. I just started the game after restarting my computer. Sorry if this wasn't any help. Worked for me
If you lust for blood or like getting slaughtered, this is the game for you. 10/10

SKIN MATH TIME
C = Cells / S = Shards / B= Blood points

C=$3.00 = S=4.5k / S= 2k = B= 150k BP

1S = 75B
Now while you cannot trade B to S, this also tells us the value of one S is 1/75 of one B./ Or 0.01333(...)B

To determine the value of C
And the exchange of the three

$0.01 = 1C = 18S = 1350B


https://i.imgur.com/m5QdYJv.png

Assuming you purchased ONE part of this 3 piece set at full cost
No combo deal
This is $4.00 = 400C = 7,200S = 540,000B
For each item
Meaning the outfit is a total of 1.62M blood


Average time: 20 minutes
experience per round: 500
average reward per round:17,500 BP

You're "earning" $0.38.888(...)/hr in equivalent value.

That means for example.
For that 400C item
Which we know is $4
That is "worth" about 10.5 hours of your playtime.
Some of your cheaper sets
Are only looking at 3-4 hours.
So essentially "does a skin worth a long workday's worth of playing to put on feel worth it to you"

This game is incredible. After searching for a great game to play with my friends, my searched stopped upon purchasing this game. The sudden burst of adrenaline you feel when the killer is chasing you is amazing, or the fear in your chest when the killer walks right past you. As the killer, you can chase people down, set traps. Winning is not as easy as it looks, on both ends of the spectrum. My only upset, is that there is no premade lobbies, so me and my friends cannot play together against other online people, just in private matches. All in all, amazing game.

Hey Starbreeze Studios, congratulations on meeting the June 14th deadline for the Dead by Daylight beta release......wait, what? The beta was last month? The June 14th release was the full game? seriously? Oh shit, my bad....

Ok lets start over...

Hey  Starbreeze Studios congratulations on releasing a half a game on June 14th.
I mean, the half a game is not bad...in fact, its fun. But its still not....what's the word I'm looking for? um.....complete?
Yeah thats the word, complete. And charging $20 for an incomplete game isnt the worst thing you could do, hell RUST made a shit load of money on an early developement game that they never finished.....then scrapped that game, only to replace it with a COMPLETELY new game, which sucked ass....so I guess what I'm trying to say is please Starbreeze Studios....Don't scrap this game and replace it with a COMPLETELY new game, just finish this game.

So in closing, if paying $20 to play a psycho killer who runs around a couple of different maps that look EXACTLY THE SAME sounds like fun (i'm not even gonna mention the lack of grouping with friends......fuck I just did) , then give it a try.

An amazing game, I love the gameplay. I find it intense in most cases when the killer is near you and the jukes are endless! The cornfield is a well-made place to troll the killer and run off, 10/10 game. Would love to have a lobby to add friends to and play with randoms!

I can't recommend this game yet. It needs fixing.

Like everyone says, matchmaking is probably the biggest issue. Mostly long load times, but it does sometimes take 2-3 minutes to fill up a lobby. Which is a long time if you consider some games you're only alive for 2 minutes. As in there really isn't any. If you want to be the killer, you make a lobby and people will join. If you're a survivor you join a lobby. But no party system is in place though the devs are working on it. Players disconnect every game, I have crashed multiple times, and while it's not really the devs fault, a camping killer will ruin the game. As a personal note, I have always HATED perk systems. With a fiery passion. I wish they would die.

As for bugs, there aren't many game breaking bugs or exploitable bugs, but I've run into a few that make life very difficult. Like not being able to pick up a downed survivor, or survivors living though multiple hook hangings (they are supposed to die automatically the second time).

So far I can't really complain about balance issues except for the camping killers.

It has potential, but it's not finished. Wait for it.

EDIT: So after the last few patches, they fixed many game breaking bugs, and added a party system. It still takes forever to get into a game with multiple survivors, but that's not a problem on the part of the devs, rather the killer to survivor ratio. So most of my previous complaints are no longer valid.

So it's now a good game right?

Yes. But it's not fun.

Let me explain. This game is not designed to be fun. It's just not. It's designed with a heavy bias to the killer, regardless of what anybody says about survivors being OP. The killer is, and always will be, stronger and better than the survivors. That's the point of the game. It's not fair, and it's meant to be that way. As a survivor, you are meant to have all the odds stacked against you, and still be able to get out alive.

That's not fun for me. So I won't recommend the game. But many of my friends love the challenge. The devs had a vision, and they brought it to life. It's good. I just don't like it.
Muy bien, tiene algunas cosas por arreglar pero en general es muy entretenido.

Voc√™ curte SurvivelHorror? Ficar aflito por causa de batidas cardiacas no seu head? Gosta de agonia?
Esse e o jogo certo pra voc√™!!!

O jogo e ta em beta mas mesmo assim a jogabilidade ta surpreendente para uma desenvolvedora Indie.
Mas... como todo jogo do mundo, nada e perfeito.Ent√£o vamos para os 'Pros&Contras' do jogo:

Pros:
- Voc√™ pode escolher entre 4 sobreviventes (2 homens e 2 mulheres) ou entre 3 assasinos e cada um deles tem sua propria arvore de habilidade e seus proprios custom, onde voce pode fazer seu Char do jeitinho que voc√™ quiser <3
- E um jogo 4x1, onde o objetivo √©: ligar os 5 geradores e abrir o port√£o para fugir ou impedir que os 4 sobreviventes liguem os 5 geradores, simples!
Com isso e uma infinidade de coisas para fazer, incluindo baus de itens e medkit espalhado pelo mapa.
- At√© agora o jogo n√£o apresentou nenhum bug ou problema (para mim) que me atrapalha-se no jogo.
- Vis√µes alternados entre 1¬∞ e 3¬∞ pessoa
- Da um medinho dessa merda de trilha do k7!z

Contras:
- Ainda n√£o tem  o t√£o aclamodo "Voice" pra conversar com o seu time, que iria ser maneiro pra formar estrategia.
- Faltou um tutorial mais explicativo, onde mostra as teclas e o que fazer, e uma CG no jogo que tem umas legenda... quem nao souber ingles ou tem dificuldade (assim como eu) vai se debater um pouco pra jogar.
- Faltou tambem uma janela pra facilitar o asseso para as salas (lobby), as vezes demora pra achar.
- S√£o poucos recursos no cenario para interagir (tirando os obstaculos, baus, armarios e os geradores), faltou aquele gostinho de atrapalhar o assasino mais...
- N√£o sei porque eu comprei isso... acho que gosto de sofrer (._.' )

O jogo acabou de sair, mais vamos ver o que ver por ai... ainda n√£o se sabe no dia de amanha

This is one of the more fun games I've played on steam since I've had an account here. It is extremely innovative, even if you think of it in terms of Evolve or Damned. Everytime I play there is a heart pounding moment.

While I don't particularly like scary things, the game is scary enough to make me wanna scream and cry, but also not scary enough to make me not play it.

The only negative is that it can be buggy, but I feel like most games are now, so thats not really a problem to me.

7/10

Great concept, nice selection of characters and killers. Though some things seem a little unbalanced. Takes entirely too long to perform simple tasks like healing or looking in a chest for goodies. Would be nice to be able to hurt the killer instead of simply running for your life.

The game is fun though, and I think there is real potential for expansion and improvements over time with more characters, killers, maps and more.

Been playing on and off since launch, I've seen this game grow from it's humble beginnings to it's current form and I'm very amazed at it's journey so far!  Little by little the Devs have made the game better such as upgrading the graphics, updating the sounds, getting rid of a lot of bad bugs, some of which have plagued it since launch, and lastly they added crossplay which is a nice feature to have IMO. 

Overall I think this game is amazing and I hope it continues to do well for another 4 years and beyond!

Is it perfect? No. Is it fun? Bloody hell yes. 

This game isn't going to be for everyone. Odds are you ARE going to be helpless as a suvivor. That's the point. Survivors are suppose to be helpless against a Killer. As a suvivor you don't play to win games, you play to survive them. And as a Killer you play to do one thing and only one thing, kill. If you don't like being helpless against an unstopable Killer IF he finds you, then odds are you aren't going to like Dead by Daylight. But if you are smart. Then either the Survivors or Killer can turn the odds in their favor to make fools out of the other.

Pros-
-Playing as a slasher flick killer. 3 of them with more in the works.
-Being a victim of a slasher flick. Escape death with skill, maybe just dumb luck, or die in soiled pants.
-4v1 gameplay that goes extra lengths to make each side stand apart from the other.
-Great use of sounds for information.
-RNG tile based maps. 1-2 landmarks per map will aways be in the same places, but everything else will change every game.
-Games last 10 minutes on average.

Cons-
-Some model bugs like rarely seeing your own hair/eyes as a Killer or some janky movement with Killers interacting with suvivors.
-Balance. One Killer is weaker than the other 2. Windows close together can make near 100% safe zones for survivors depending on a few things. Some perks are rather annoying, maybe a touch OP.
-Games have no timers. If someone wants to waste your time, they can if they are good enough.
-No communication. It is impossible to talk to each other without 3rd party chats like Steam, Teamspeak, Skype, ect.
-Making a lobby as a Killer can take up to 10 minutes to fill. Not from player counts mind you. Either another bug or a waiting list with strict "first come, first filled" rules.

In short-

For $20 you are going to get one hell of a fun game! Just note that it might not be for everyone as not everyone can handle playing as victims who are by design made to be helpless more often than not.

Uprated!!!

I must say i have never had more fun with a new game on steam than this game. I dont know why but i love playing the game so much after 1 game you have the feeling to play another and another. The game hooks u on :). 

My only problem and i assume for others is the bugs that are in it and not being able to play with friends online. I dont really run into much bugs but the ones i do run into are not game breaking for me like the floating survivor (thats just funny :D)

And as for playing with with friends online i understand how it would be unfair for the killer to go up against 4 people with communication but if you guys can not implement that at least give us the abillity to earn bloodpoints in private maybe at half the normal amount something. I just wish that we got some reward for playing private.

All in all the game is very fun and i highly think that you should buy and play the game cause trust me u will enjoy it if you like these survival type games

This game have tons of fun and excitement even when playing alone, but i would not recomment it at this moment.

1.) Full of bugs such as one of it is jumping over a window and get stucked and the killer just look at me and just like oh poor little goat is going to die and i cant do sht.

2.) Old school match making. The most terrible things i face when playing this game, the connection stability is base on the host killer, means if killer had a bad connection speed, you are screwed.

3.) Very hard to find a room, im not sure is this matchmaking is for worldwide? but i keep finding no matches, which i feel like this game only have about less than 20 people playing it i guess?

4.) When a people leave a room, you should reduce the generator to work on,but no mostly what i met is when a player leave, it left only 3 people to work on 5 generator and facing a killer =)

5.) Teamwork, annoying as sht, no communication in game, we just do not know what we are doing, sometimes i was trying to say, ill save him and you all work on generator, it ends up all are waiting to save people or sometimes no one will save it.

This game is just not ready yet, fun, yeay, headeach yeay, frustration yeay. Not recommended at the moment when all these issue are fixed

Great price
Great Graphics
Great Layout

Pros:
-Atmosphere
-New positions on the generators even if you play on the same map(which results in making the game fun to play on the same map)
-Friendly game(easy to learn)
-Perks 
-Character Leveling and Daily jobs
Cons:
-No party system (which results in long queues)
-No in-game communication with the other survivors (chat or voice communication)
-Skill checks are often late or sometimes even if you press the button later it counts as a well done check
-Inconsistant ranking system
Overall if you like to play with friends don't buy it yet.You will have a hard time getting together into lobby and you will ruin other lobbies aswell.If you plan on buying it to play solo try it.I have fun playing it.

This game isn't as scary as some might think it is but it is difficullt becuase you never know where the killer is and at any moment it can come and kill you. The only complaint is that you have to be the killer to start a lobby where it should be anyone can start a lobby.
THis Game is hella fun and scary at times. I can't wait for them to add a party system to the game :D.
